H0.text: who was the greatest pool player of all time. Willie Mosconi

H1.text: who was the greatest pool player of all time. Minnesota Fats

H2.text: who was the greatest pool player of all time. Ralph Greenleaf

H3.text: who was the greatest pool player of all time. Efren Manalang Reyes

A4.text: Ralph Greenleaf is widely considered one of the greatest pool players of all time.

A5.text: What Babe Ruth did for baseball, Dempsey did for fighting, Tilden did for tennis...Greenleaf did for pocket billiards.
